definition: one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
season/the last month of a season/fourth or youngest amongst brothers/classifier for seasonal crop yields

sentences.english: It's what I call an "all-rounder. " Sort of thing one can wear with anything to any occasion.
sentences.chinese: 我最欣赏这种手饰，一年四季，任何场合都能戴。

sentences.english: My sister is a vegetable lover, so she plants various vegetables in the garten all around the year.
sentences.chinese: 妹妹喜欢种菜园，一年四季菜园里都有不同的菜。

sentences.english: With the mildest climate in France, Menton is worth a visit during any month of the year.
sentences.chinese: 最温和的气候，一年四季都值得一游。

sentences.english: The scenery changes from morning to evening, from season to season.
sentences.chinese: 一年四季，晨昏景色各有不同。

sentences.english: Today the lake is a year-round paradise for the fishermen.
sentences.chinese: 现在这个湖是钓鱼者一年四季的天堂。

sentences.english: Manufactured goods from Asia keep flowing into this natural ice-free harbor throughout the year.
sentences.chinese: 亚洲的产品一年四季源源不断地运入这座天然不冻港。

sentences.english: In Guangdong, the weather is fine and there are many flowers; the bees work all year round without a stop.
sentences.chinese: 广东天气好，花又多，蜜蜂一年四季都不闲着。

sentences.english: The seasons came and went and they revolved round Joshua.
sentences.chinese: 寒来署去，冬去春来，一年四季仿佛围绕着J旋转。

sentences.english: Our company sells fresh fruits all year round.
sentences.chinese: 本公司一年四季供应时鲜果品。

sentences.english: Unlike apples, fresh persimmon is not available year round.
sentences.chinese: 柿子不像苹果，一年四季可以吃得到。

sentences.english: The center of Australia is hot and dry all the year round.
sentences.chinese: 澳大利亚的中部则一年四季都炎热而干燥。

sentences.english: What's the weather like in London throughout the year?
sentences.chinese: 伦敦一年四季的天气如何？

sentences.english: The four suits represent the four seasons: Spring, Summer, Fall and Winter.
sentences.chinese: 四种花样代表一年四季，春夏秋冬。

sentences.english: Not enough oxygen for the roots…which do what twenty-four hours a day in all seasons?
sentences.chinese: 根部没有足够的氧气，一年四季每天都在做的是什么？

sentences.english: Hawaii is an all-the-year-round tourist resort.
sentences.chinese: 夏威夷一年四季都是旅游胜地。

sentences.english: It is wild, and humid all year around in this old house.
sentences.chinese: 这间老宅子一年四季都是温湿的。

definition: four seasons, namely: spring 春, summer 夏, autumn 秋 and winter 冬
the four seasons/spring, summer, autumn and winter
four seasons like spring/favorable climate throughout the year
